content: opossum bag holder & dispenser by wormcube v 11/7/2024 abbreviations materials  single_crochet= single_crochet  4 0mm hook  half_double_crochet= half-double_crochet  3 5mm hook  double_crochet= double_crochet  worsted weight yarn in light gray  slip_stitch= slip_stitch dark gray white pink  chain= chain and beige optional  increase= increase  12mm safety eyes  decrease= decrease main body 4 0mm hook starting at the tail in beige or pink if preferred in continuous rounds r1 sc6 in magic_ring 6 r2-8 sc6 6 r9 increase sc5 7 r10-18 sc7 7 r19 increase sc6 8 r20-25 sc8 8 connect the tail loop fig 1 r26 push hook behind post between r3&r4 then through 1st stitch pull up a loop through both and single_crochet together repeat 2x in next 8 posts and stitches then sc5 in the rest of the round r27-30 sc8 8 r31 increase sc7 9 r32-36 sc9 9 r37 sc8 single_crochet w/ switch to dark gray in 9 last loop fasten_off beige and weave in end r38 increase sc8 10 r39-40 sc10 10 r41 increase sc9 11 figure 1 crochet together post r42 sc11 11 between r3&r4 and single_crochet in r25 r43 sc10 single_crochet w/ switch to light gray in 11 last loop fasten_off dark gray and weave in end r44 increase sc10 12 r45 sc12 12 r46 single_crochet increase *6 18 r47 sc18 18 r48 sc2 increase *6 24 r49 sc24 24 r50 sc3 increase *6 30 r51 sc4 increase *6 36 r52 sc5 increase *6 42 r53 sc6 increase *6 48 r54 sc7 increase *6 54 r55-56 sc54 54 forming the opening r57 ch15 skip 14 and single_crochet into 15th stitch of round sc2 increase sc8 60 increase *4 r58 sc15 across chain sc45 across round 60 r59-60 sc60 60 r61 half_double_crochet dc59 60 r62-74 dc60 60 r75 half_double_crochet sc59 60 r76 sc8 decrease *6 54 r77 sc7 decrease *6 48 r78 sc6 decrease *6 42 r79 single_crochet switching to white* sc23 single_crochet *do not fasten_off gray you will switching to l gray sc9 single_crochet 42 be switching between gray and switching to white sc7 white repeatedly in this section r80 sc5 decrease *3 sc4 single_crochet switching to l gray decrease sc5 decrease switching 36 to white sc5 decrease r81 sc23 single_crochet switching to l gray 36 sc5 single_crochet switching to white sc6 r82 sc22 decrease single_crochet switching to l gray sc3 decrease switching to white 33 sc3 decrease single_crochet r83 sc24 single_crochet switching to l gray sc2 single_crochet switching to white single_crochet 5 33 r84 sc23 decrease single_crochet switching to l gray decrease switching to white single_crochet 30 decrease sc2 fasten_off l gray r85 sc30 30 r86 sc23 decrease single_crochet decrease sc2 28 r87 sc23 decrease decrease single_crochet 26 r88 decrease sc21 decrease single_crochet 24 forming the upper jaw fig 3 r89 sc4 single_crochet switching to pink* ch8 *fasten_off white here but after next color skip 11 and single_crochet into 12th stitch 21 change you will be switching back and switching to white sc7 forth
